typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	format: 'xml',
	fileSystem: 'messagefiles',
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true) ~> messageOutput
messageOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: '',
	format: 'cdm',
	corpusPath: '',
	folderPath: '',
	fileSystem: '',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: '',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MessageXML
